name: thaw-parser
description: A Node.js parser for programming languages. Written in TypeScript.

scripts.all: npm run rebuild-online && npm pack && npm run deploy
scripts.allw: rmdir /Q /S coverage & rmdir /Q /S lib & npm run lint & npm run prettiercheck & npm run build & npm test & npm pack & move /Y thaw-parser-*.tgz C:\git\npm-packages\
scripts.rebuild-offline: npm run clean-offline && npm run build-and-test
scripts.rebuild-online: npm run clean-online && npm i && npm run build-and-test
scripts.clean-online: npm run clean-offline && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.build-and-test: npm run prettiercheck && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test: if [ -z "$BUILD_ESM" ]; then jest; else echo "Testing disabled for Angular."; fi
scripts.build: if [ -z "$BUILD_ESM" ]; then npm run build-es2015cjs; else npm run build-es2015mjs; fi
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.f: npm run format && npm run all

// bundledDependencies: ... is an array of package names
author: Tom Weatherhead <thaw@2hrd4u.org> (https://github.com/tom-weatherhead)
